01wk-1: 이미지자료분석


최규빈

title: 01wk-1: 이미지자료분석
text:
A. Step1: DLS(=데이터) 준비

dls = ImageDataLoaders.from_folder(
    path = './images', 
    train='train', 
    valid_pct = 0.2, 
    item_tfms=Resize(224),
) 


dls.show_batch()

title: 01wk-1: 이미지자료분석
text:
B. Step2: 러너생성

lrnr = vision_learner(
    dls = dls,
    arch = resnet34, 
    metrics = accuracy
)

title: 01wk-1: 이미지자료분석
text:
D. Step4: 예측

lrnr.show_results()
















inter = Interpretation.from_learner(lrnr)
inter.plot_top_losses(16)
